alert.note: Alert for Benton; Carroll; Crawford; Franklin; Madison; Sebastian; Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Excessive Heat Warning issued August 20 at 7:52PM CDT until August 20 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...EXCESSIVE HEAT WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM CDT THIS EVENING... ...EXCESSIVE HEAT WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 8 PM CDT MONDAY... * WHAT...For Sunday evening Excessive Heat Warning, dangerously hot conditions with heat index values up to 120. For the Excessive Heat Warning Monday, dangerously hot conditions with heat index values up to 118 expected. * WHERE...In Arkansas, Benton, Carroll, Washington AR and Madison Counties. In Oklahoma, Adair County. * WHEN...For the Sunday evening Excessive Heat Warning, until 9 PM CDT this evening. For the Monday Excessive Heat Warning, from 11 AM to 8 PM CDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Hot temperatures and high humidity will combine to create a dangerous situation in which heat illnesses are possible.
info.instruction: Take extra precautions if you work or spend time outside. When possible, reschedule strenuous activities to early morning or evening. Know the signs and symptoms of heat exhaustion and heat stroke. Wear light weight and loose fitting clothing when possible and drink plenty of water. To reduce risk during outdoor work the occupational safety and health administration recommends scheduling frequent rest breaks in shaded or air conditioned environments. Anyone overcome by heat should be moved to a cool and shaded location. Heat stroke is an emergency, call 911.

area.areaDesc: Benton; Carroll; Crawford; Franklin; Madison; Sebastian; Washington
